subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka held visiting Milwaukee to two unearned runs pitching into the seventh inning Saturday, and David Ortiz hit a three-run homer to help the Red Sox beat the Brewers.
snippet: Daisuke Matsuzaka held visiting Milwaukee to two unearned runs pitching into the seventh inning Saturday, and David Ortiz hit a three-run homer to help the Red Sox beat the Brewers.
